titles.title: Northern Mariana Islands Small Business Act
Northern Mariana Islands Small Business Act
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to ensure that the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands is eligible for certain Small Business Administration programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Northern Mariana Islands Small Business Act
This bill expands eligibility for certain Small Business Administration programs to the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
